Content.Text:
<FACE_LILIE><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
Oh hi, <MYNAME>.
<PAGE>
I was just checking out the cloud movement. It
looks like today's nice weather will last into
tonight.

<FACE_LILIE><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
Hm? How do I know that?
<PAGE>
<FACE_LAUGH>Heehee! Knowing the weather is part of my job,
y'know.
<PAGE>
<FACE_NORMAL>I've learned enough that by checking cloud types
and feeling how the wind is blowing, I can tell if
it's gonna rain...
<PAGE>
Or if the nice weather is going to continue for a
while.
That's amazing!
You don't just read a teleprompter?
You must've studied a lot.

<FACE_LILIE><POS_LEFT><FACE_LAUGH>
He he! Thanks.
<PAGE>
<FACE_NORMAL>Hey, I know. Do you want to watch clouds with
me?

<FACE_LILIE><POS_LEFT><FACE_LAUGH>
Don't worry. You don't need to know anything
about meteorology to enjoy looking at clouds.
<PAGE>
I saw one that looked like a parfait just a few
minutes ago.

<FACE_LILIE><POS_LEFT><FACE_LAUGH>
Hee hee! You're such a glutton for good food,
<MYNAME>.

<FACE_LILIE><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
All good. I'm just glad that you're interested in it
at all.
<PAGE>
<FACE_LAUGH>Oh, hey! <MYNAME>, let's see who can spot the
funniest-looking cloud first! ♪

<FACE_LILIE><POS_LEFT><FACE_SAD>
Me? Not anymore. Some people do, though. I
did, when I first started. I was just an actress,
then.
<PAGE>
I didn't have any qualifications as a
meteorologist, so all I could do was, yeah, read
lines off the prompter.
<PAGE>
But now I'm a certified weather forecaster, and I
get to write my own scripts.

<FACE_LILIE><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
All good.
<PAGE>
<FACE_LAUGH>Hey, I know. Do you want to watch clouds with
me?
<PAGE>
Don't worry. You don't need to know anything
about meteorology to enjoy looking at clouds.

<FACE_LILIE><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
Oh, um, i-it's nothing. I was just surprised that
you thought of it that way.
<PAGE>
I mean, when I mention it, most people tell me
they expect a weathergirl to know all about the
weather.
<PAGE>
<FACE_LAUGH>So I'm really flattered that you think that.
<PAGE>
But you're right. I did study meteorology really
hard.

<FACE_LILIE><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
Did you know that I used to be just a regular
actress with no weather forecasting credentials
or anything?

<FACE_LILIE><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
Well, it's true.
<PAGE>
Though nowadays, I've gotten pretty famous as
a weathergirl.
<PAGE>
<FACE_LOSS>When I first got the job, I was just a regular
actress. I had some exposure in the industry, but
not much.
<PAGE>
Of course, I didn't know the first thing about the
weather. I just read whatever was on the
prompter.
<PAGE>
<FACE_NORMAL>But the more I did it, the more I started to learn
about meteorology.
<PAGE>
I eventually decided I wanted to read and
understand meteorological reports myself, and
tell everyone in my own words.
<PAGE>
<FACE_LAUGH>It wasn't easy, but I studied really hard and
earned my certification in weather forecasting.

<FACE_LILIE><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
Being able to use my own words has made my
job lots more fun. It's practically a part of me,
now.
<PAGE>
Of course, I do enjoy doing other jobs as a
regular actress, too...
<PAGE>
<FACE_LAUGH>...but I have the best time when I'm working
with the weather.

<FACE_LILIE><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
Now, even when I'm not at work, I'll catch
myself looking up at the sky...
<PAGE>
There's no separating me from what goes on up
there anymore.

<FACE_LILIE><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
Hm? You want to watch the clouds with me?
<PAGE>
<FACE_LAUGH>Sure! That'd be awesome! Let's look at them
together. ♪

<FACE_LILIE><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
Hm? You want to know what's up with that
weird-shaped cloud over there?
<PAGE>
<FACE_LOSS>Um...which one are you talking about? I don't
see it...

<FACE_LILIE><POS_LEFT><FACE_LAUGH>
Oh, that one? He he! It's weird for sure, but that
shape doesn't have any impact on the weather.
<PAGE>
<FACE_NORMAL>Hmmm... It almost looks like a soft-serve ice
cream cone...
<PAGE>
<WINDOW_EXCLAMATION_L><FACE_LOSS>Eep?!

<FACE_LILIE><POS_LEFT><FACE_SAD>
Ohmigosh, that startled me! Thanks,
<MYNAME>.

<FACE_LILIE><POS_LEFT><FACE_LOVE>
<WINDOW_QUESTION_L>EEP?!

<FACE_LILIE><POS_LEFT><FACE_LOVE>
I-it's nothing! I, um, I was just surprised, that's
all.

<FACE_LILIE><POS_LEFT><FACE_LAUGH>
Um, I-I just remembered something I need to do!
I've got to get going!
<PAGE>
Th-thanks for hanging out with me today,
<MYNAME>! See you later!

<FACE_LILIE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOVE>
Ohmigosh, ohmigosh, ohmigosh!!
<PAGE>
I-I've never had a boy lean that close to me
before. Geez, I can still feel my face burning!
<PAGE>
I hope <MYNAME> didn't think I was being too
weird. After he was nice enough to hang out
with me, too. I shouldn't have done that...
